mapper.select: select o_id, l_xcordinate, l_ycordinate from location l inner join offering o on l.l_code = o.l_code

select offering.o_id, l_xcordinate, l_ycordinate, ok_code, ok_deposit, ok_maintenance_cost, ok_month_of_payment, od_short_lease, od_occupy_date from offering, location, offering_kind, offering_detail where offering.l_code = location.l_code AND offering.o_id = offering_kind.o_id AND offering.o_id = offering_detail.o_id order by dbms_random.random
